who_am_i_first_description: Hi, my name is Pawel Tkaczyk. I am a designer who has been constantly evolving in the world of digital creativity since my youth. For the past 7 years, I have specialized in designing web applications, mobile applications and websites. I also have experience in managing development teams in the implementation of both web and cross-platform (iOS/Android) projects.
who_am_i_second_description: For the past year, I have had the pleasure of working at the Central Informatics Center as a Senior UX/UI Designer on projects such as ePayments and the new mObywatel app. I welcome any challenge, creating and implementing my own solutions, proven methods or improving existing ideas.
who_am_i_look: See what I can do for You.
